comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Looks OK.

Do we need this already in 1.2.x? If yes, then I'd rather have it already in 1.2 instead of 1.2.1. If no, then I'd rather target 1.3 and let it live in trunk for a few months.

comments.author: Tobias Bocanegra
comments.body: the sooner the better :-) so 1.2 then.

description: Some of the methods in the core parts of jackrabbit are package protected and do not allow easy subclassing. suggest to make some of the methods 'protected'.
summary: change some access-level modifiers to allow for better subclassing
